mapper.select: SELECT menu_id , menu_name , menu_level , menu_sequence , parent_menu_id FROM sam_menu WHERE menu_level IN (1, 2) AND use_flag = 'Y' ORDER BY menu_level , menu_sequence

SELECT DISTINCT A.menu_id , A.menu_name , A.menu_level , A.menu_sequence , A.parent_menu_id , C.action_url FROM sam_menu A LEFT OUTER JOIN sam_menu_action B ON B.default_menuaction_flag = 'Y' AND B.menu_id = A.menu_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sam_action C ON B.action_id = C.action_id WHERE A.use_flag = 'Y' ORDER BY A.menu_id , A.menu_sequence
